pages.text: A very useful enchantment for upgrading your Buddy Medallions. This enchant affects each medal differently, and you can see what it does under the set pages. Each level will increase the perks given by your Buddy Medal.

pages.title: Enchant Levels
pages.text: Buddy Boost has 2 levels. For Buddy Boost I, you need a level 15 enchanting table, while for Buddy Boost II, you will need a level 30, or maxed out, one.
